ModMetaData.name: RimNauts
ModMetaData.author: Nolabritt, sindre0830, Sophist88
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds Near-Earth Objects like moons, asteroids and space debris. Everything is visible and animated as an orbit on the world map mode. The moon is a playable biome that you need to discover and travel to using a rocket.
Credits:
C#: - Nolabritt (https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198032541893/myworkshopfiles/) - Zylle
NET.4.7.2 XML: - Sophist88
2D art / Sprites: - Kasmex (https://ko-fi.com/kasmex) - Genome-X (https://ko-fi.com/genomex)
